Translations.Text: ibi est those abuse masjid practicing idol worship dividing believers provisus comfort to those oppose DEUS His messenger! They solemnly juravit Noster intentions est prenobilis DEUS bears testis they est liars
Vos nunquam pray such masjid. masjid established righteousness 1 feria est dignus de tuus praying therein! In ibi est people love purified DEUS loves those purify

Unus establishes his building reverencing DEUS est ac gain His approval bene 1 qui establishes his building brink crumbling cliff ut falls down cum eum into fire Hell? DEUS NON guide transgressing people
Such building they established remains stirps doubt their hearts their hearts adhuc! DEUS est Omniscient Wise

DEUS bought believers their VITA their MONETA Paradise. Sic they fight causa DEUS testimentum kill get killed Such est His truthful pledge Torah Gospel Quran - Qui fulfills His pledge bene than DEUS? Vos rejoice factus such exchange Hoc est major triumph
